data.title: Last Action Hero - Sky Cinema Heists
data.meta_description: Last Action Hero: Comedy adventure, with Arnold Schwarzenegger. Last Action Hero airs on Sky Cinema Heists at 2:45 AM, Saturday 3 August. Comedy adventure, with Arnold Schwarzenegger
data.text: A boy watching an action movie is transported into the film by a magic ticket and meets its hero figure, who refuses to believe he is a fictional character. Matters take a turn for the worse when the screen villain gets hold of the ticket and crosses over into the real world - where bad guys can win. Comedy adventure, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Austin O'Brien, Charles Dance, F Murray Abraham and Anthony Quinn
